about_the_game:
Ink Link is a sleek world of action in 2.5D! Outsmart enemies, piece together platforms, and upgrade your skills to take on powerful bosses. Discover hidden paths as darkness creeps in and your ally-turned-enemy, Ink, tests your skills—and your will to survive.

Features

  • Ink, who guides you through your journey, both as an ally... and a nemesis.

  • 5 main areas with a boss at the end of each one

  • Each area consists of multiple levels

  • Each level consists of a number of platforms that the player needs to assemble

  • In each level, enemies hinder the player's quest

  • As the game advances, a fog of war develops, making navigating the level more difficult

  • A multitude of skills to buy and upgrade

  • Many weapons to choose from

  • A whole lot of fun

As darkness creeps in, make your way through the battlefield

Ink, your not-so-faithful guide, might plunge you in darkness if you are not careful and step too close. Be sure to fight off the enemies while staying away from danger.

Relentlessly assemble platforms

Piece together scattered platforms to complete the level and progress. Each step in your assembly brings you closer to your goal, testing your wit and spatial awareness.

Test your skills against powerful bosses

Navigate through enemy-filled levels as you dodge, shoot, and outsmart foes that block your path. At the end of each area, face off against unique bosses, each with distinct abilities and weaknesses. These encounters push your skills to the limit as you find ways to counter their relentless attacks.

Choose from a variety of skills and weapons

Unlock powerful new abilities and weapons and boost your stats with the XP you earn. Customize your playstyle by enhancing health, attack power, and more, ensuring you’re ready for whatever the next level throws at you. Choose from a variety of weapons depending on the situation.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or later (or equivalent distributions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 3 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel HD 4000 or equivalent) or 2 GB VRAM (NVIDIA/AMD)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in sound card (ALSA or PulseAudio compatible)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or later (or equivalent distributions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 5 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 570 or equivalent (with 4 GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in sound card (ALSA or PulseAudio compatible, or external sound card)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 (Mojave) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630 (or equivalent), or Apple M1 GPU with 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in sound card (DirectX-compatible for macOS or standard audio hardware)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11.0 (Big Sur) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro or Intel Core i7 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 Pro/Max GPU, or equivalent discrete GPU with at least 4 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in sound card (or any standard external sound card)
